generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Barlow:wght@100;200;300;400;500;600;700;800;900&display=swap");*{padding:0;margin:0;box-sizing:border-box}body{font-family:Barlow,sans-serif;background-color:#fff;font-size:16px;overflow-x:hidden}header{padding-top:23px}header nav{padding:0 24px;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}header .main__btn{font-size:1rem;padding:.6rem 1.1rem;font-weight:600;line-height:26px;background-color:#e8eff2;border:1px solid transparent;border-radius:8px}@media screen and (min-width:680px){header{padding-top:40px}header nav{padding:0 39px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){header{padding-top:55px}header nav{padding:0 165px}}.hero .hero__content{padding:0 24px;margin-top:60px}.hero .hero__content__title{font-size:3rem;line-height:48px;font-weight:900}.hero .hero__content__description{font-size:1rem;line-height:26px;color:#7b8bad;margin-top:35px}.hero .hero__content__primary{margin-top:32px;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;font-size:1rem}.hero .hero__content__btn{background-color:#f16718;color:#fff}.hero .hero__content__span{display:inline-block;font-weight:600;color:#7b8bad}.hero .hero__img__img{width:100%;margin-left:24px;margin-top:67px;border-radius:24px 0 0 24px}@media screen and (min-width:680px){.hero{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-between;margin-top:65px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.hero{padding:0 165px;gap:140px}.hero .hero__content{padding:0;align-self:center}.hero .hero__content__title{font-size:3.5rem;line-height:56px}.hero .hero__content__description{font-size:1.125rem}.hero .hero__content__primary{gap:60px;justify-content:flex-start}}.primary{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;margin-top:15px;gap:70px 20px}.primary .primary__img1__img,.primary .primary__img2__img{width:100%;height:100%;border-radius:20px}.primary .primary__img1__img{opacity:.2}.primary .primary__img1{background-color:#f16718;border-radius:0 20px 20px 0}.primary .primary__img2{grid-area:1/2/1/4;border-radius:20px;margin-right:24px}.primary .primary__content{grid-area:2/1/2/4;margin:0 24px}.primary .primary__content__title{font-size:2rem;padding:0 36px;line-height:36px;font-weight:900;text-align:center;color:#162542}.primary .primary__content__description{font-size:1rem;line-height:26px;color:#7b8bad;margin-top:25px;text-align:center}@media screen and (min-width:680px){.primary{margin-top:48px}.primary .primary__img1{border-radius:20px;margin-left:39px}.primary .primary__img2{margin-right:39px}.primary .primary__content{display:flex;flex-wrap:nowrap;gap:100px}.primary .primary__content__title{font-size:2rem;padding:0 15px;line-height:36px;font-weight:900;text-align:left;color:#162542}.primary .primary__content__description{text-align:left;margin-right:15px}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.primary{grid-template-columns:1fr 2fr 1fr;margin:48px 145px 48px 165px}.primary .primary__img1{margin-left:0}.primary .primary__img2{grid-area:1/2/1/3}.primary .primary__content{grid-area:1/3/1/4;gap:10px;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.primary .primary__content__title{padding:0 15px 0 0}.primary .primary__content__description{margin-right:0}}.secondary{margin-top:117px}.secondary .cards{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(250px,1fr));gap:20px}.secondary .card{flex-direction:column;gap:45px;margin-bottom:45px}.secondary .card,.secondary .card__image__holder{display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.secondary .card__image__holder{background-color:#f16718;width:65px;height:65px;border-radius:20px}.secondary .card__title{font-size:1.5rem;line-height:28px;font-weight:900;color:#162542;margin:0 100px;text-align:center}.secondary .card__description{font-size:1rem;line-height:26px;color:#7b8bad;margin-top:0;padding:0 24px;text-align:center}@media screen and (min-width:680px){.secondary{margin-left:39px;margin-right:98px;margin-top:134px}.secondary .card{align-items:baseline}.secondary .card__title{margin:0;text-align:left}.secondary .card__description{padding:0;text-align:left}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.secondary{margin:134px 165px 0}}.footer__content{font-size:1rem;line-height:26px;color:#7b8bad;margin-top:35px;text-align:center;padding-bottom:24px}.footer__content span{font-weight:700}
